item.description:
Break Out Story Slams @  Doyle’s Cafe

Sundays: Doors@6:30 

Show@7:00  $10

 

Breaking the Rules!  -an off season slams series. You can break one (1)  story slam rule per show. You still bring your story –Yes, it is still a story slam; true*, first person no notes, 5 minutes, original material only. Prizes and more details TBA at massmouth.com/events pages and on FB and Twitter

 

July 8  Prop it Up! A prop or a costume piece is an integral part of your story. A bat, a box, a tux, a hat…use your imagination & then bring it.

 

August 5  Fictional Personas -  Your true or fictional stories told in the 1st person. Channel Shakespeare, your cat or Snow White and tell your story from their perspective.  (*we drop the true story rule at this slam)

 

Story Slam Season IV in Fall 2012:
Club Passim dates are MONDAYS: SEP 17 OCT 15 NOV 19 DEC 17  JAN 21 2013  FEB 18 MAR 18 and 
Doyle’s date are SUNDAYS :  SEP 9, OCT 14, NOV 11,  DEC 9, JAN 13, FEB 10, MAR 10

group.name: Greater Boston and MA Storytelling Meetup Group

item.name: Break Out # 3 of 4 slams "Prop It Up!"
